about_the_game:
Wishlist Sky Link 2 Now!





Sky Link 2 is a groundbreaking aerial shooter that gives you unparalleled freedom as you fly powerful Unmanned Combat Aerial Vehicle's (UCAV's) to unload your arsenal and defeat your opponents.

We took what we learned from the launch of the first Sky Link, pivoted, tore down, and rebuilt everything from the ground up based on your feedback.

New Features in Sky Link 2
  • All new physics-based flight
  • Progression
  • Cosmetics
  • Global Leaderboard
  • Squadron (Party) System
  • AI improvements
  • And more to come!

Form a Squadron with your friends and get into the fight! Grapple, Boost, and expertly maneuver your way across varied war-torn battlefields to prove yourself on the global leaderboard!

Earn credits in matches to unlock new drones, skins, and cosmetics.



With a renewed focus on aerial combat not yet seen in other games, Sky Link 2 pushes the boundaries of spatial awareness and high maneuverability with the sheer freedom of three-dimensional gameplay that you cant find in most shooters!

Easy to learn, difficult to master movement mechanics such as:
  • Grapple Hooks - Use your environment and swing for insane aerial moves to engage or evade players.
  • Boosters - Got a bogey on your tail? Cut your engines, and lose ‘em fast.
  • 360 Degree Warfare - Threats could be anywhere - above, behind, below. No space is safe.

Additional Game Modes coming soon!


We are solving for the introduction of flight to Team Deathmatch and all the exciting opportunities that brings. We will be open to exploring new modes in the future!

the New Weapons Of Warfare


With devastating tech at your disposal, you’ll have plenty of options when it comes to not only how you look, but what role and loadouts work best for your playstyle.

There’s no shortage of interesting skills across our selection of aircraft. From a devastating remote-controlled missile to an electromagnetic pulse that stuns enemies combatants.. it’s up to you to build a Drone that takes you to the top!

name: Sky Link 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: System: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
